name: Mono Band
description: '''Mono Band''' were an [[Republic of Ireland|Irish]] [[electronic rock]] band created by [[The Cranberries|Cranberries]] guitarist [[Noel Hogan]]. The group, which uses a different lead vocalist for almost every song,{{citation needed|date=March 2021}} first appeared when Hogan's website announced the name of his new project on 9 October 2004. Mono Band's first gig was 13 March 2005 at Dolan's in Limerick. On vocals that night were Richard Walters, Alexandra Hamnede, and Fin Chambers. This was followed by a performance at the 2005 [[South by Southwest|SXSW]] Festival in Austin, TX on 17 March.
